ValidationRule.description: Confirm values of Company Code and Controlling area. If additional values are expected for either field, this validation rule should be updated with the new values
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: or( and( SAP_Company_Code__c <> 'US30', SAP_Company_Code__c <> 'USC0', SAP_Company_Code__c <> 'MX10', SAP_Company_Code__c <> 'AU60', not(isblank(SAP_Company_Code__c))), and( SAP_Controlling_Area__c <> '2000', SAP_Controlling_Area__c <> '3000', SAP_Controlling_Area__c <> '6000', not(isblank(SAP_Controlling_Area__c))))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: You have entered an invalid Company Code or Controlling Area. Valid Company Code values are US30, USC0, MX10, or AU60. Valid Controlling Area values are 2000, 3000, and 6000
